@Testcase 1

dmem

0x00000000 2

0x00000004 8

0x00000008 13

0x0000000C 15

0x00000010 9

0x00000014 7

0x00000018 3

0x0000001C 5

0x00000020 -2

0x00000024 -6

imem

0x0000000 lw $a0 0x0004 $zero (地址4的值(8)存到$a0) ($a0 = 8)

0x00000004 lw $a1 0x0008 $zero (地址8的值(13)存到$a1) ($a1 = 13)

0x00000008 lw $a2 0x000C $zero (地址12的值(15)存到$a2) ($a2 = 15)

0x0000000C lw $a3 0x0010 $zero (地址16的值(9)存到$a3) ($a3 = 9)

0x00000010 addu $t1 $a0 $a1 ($t1 = 13+8 = 21)

0x00000014 addu $t2 $t1 $a0 ($t2 = 21+13 = 34)

0x00000018 addu $t3 $t1 $t2 ($t3 = 21+34 = 55)

0x0000001C addu $t4 $t2 $t3 ($t4 = 34+55 = 89)

0x00000020 addu $t4 $t4 $t5 ($t4 = 89+0 = 89)
 
0x00000024 addu $t5 $t5 $t1 ($t5 = 0+21 = 21)

0x00000028 addu $t6 $t5 $t6 ($t6 = 21+0 = 21)

0x0000002C halt


1 lw $a0 0x0004 $zero = 0x8C040004 = 10001100000001000000000000000100

2 lw $a1 0x0008 $zero = 0x8C050008 = 10001100000001010000000000001000

3 lw $a2 0x000C $zero = 0x8C06000C = 10001100000001100000000000001100

4 lw $a3 0x0010 $zero = 0x8C070010 = 10001100000001110000000000010000

5 addu $t1 $a0 $a1 = 0x00854821 = 00000000100001010100100000100001

6 addu $t2 $t1 $a0 = 0x01245021 = 00000001001001000101000000100001

7 addu $t3 $t1 $t2 = 0x012A5821 = 00000001001010100101100000100001

8 addu $t4 $t2 $t3 = 0x014B6021 = 00000001010010110110000000100001

9 addu $t4 $t4 $t5 = 0x018D6021 = 00000001100011010110000000100001

10 addu $t5 $t5 $t1 = 0x01A96821 = 00000001101010010110100000100001
addu $t6 $t5 $t6
subu $t6 $t5 $t6
11subu $t4 $t5 $t6

12 halt = 0xFFFFFFFF = 11111111111111111111111111111111
